title: Emerald Radiance Haaram: A Timeless South Indian Masterpiece
materials: High-Quality CZ Diamonds. Delicate Ruby accents.
features: Intricate floral and paisley design motifs handcrafted by skilled artisans. The Haaram showcases a layered pendant with an emerald center stone, surrounded by intricate filigree work and CZ diamonds. Features a detachable pendant for versatility. Embellished with delicate Ruby accents for a touch of vibrancy.
colors: Primarily gold with vibrant green emeralds and sparkling white CZ diamonds
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. Ideal for brides and those seeking a statement piece for special occasions.
description: This Haaram is a testament to South Indian craftsmanship, blending traditional design with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality materials and meticulous detailing ensures its lasting beauty and value. The detachable pendant enhances versatility, allowing you to wear it in multiple ways. The emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom.
